Title: Relates to presumptions for injured workers in opioid overdose claims for compensation
Summary: Relates to presumptions for the death of an injured worker due to opioid overdose where that injured worker was prescribed opioids as a result of his or her workplace injury.
LawCode: Amd ยง21, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to presumptions in opioid overdose claims for compensation
